name: Cafeh
description: This look has been reformatted for those who don't like Japanese comic book culture. In this way, the style became more adult and moreover simplified.

user.name: C h a c o n A l e x

additional_info: In the last update, there have been changes to button formats, link shading effects, and fonts. The background got a more elegant shape that now blend well the texture of the buttons in their shades of brown.
